q1.question: Do I need a WhatsApp Business API?
q1.answer: Yes, Varylo connects to Meta's Cloud API. We guide you step by step through setup, it takes less than 10 minutes.

q2.question: Can I change my plan later?
q2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time from your dashboard. No penalties.

q3.question: Does AI read all my messages?
q3.answer: Only when you activate analysis features. Your data is encrypted and never shared with third parties.

q4.question: What happens if the AI agent can't answer?
q4.answer: It automatically transfers to a human agent on your team. The customer never goes unattended.

q5.question: How long does integration take?
q5.answer: Less than 10 minutes to connect WhatsApp. You can have your first chatbot running in under an hour.
